pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JupyterLite SphinxA Sphinx extension that provides utilities for embedding [JupyterLite](https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io) in your documentation.## Docshttps://jupyterlite-sphinx.readthedocs.io## ExamplePractical examples are in the [ipycanvas](https://ipycanvas.readthedocs.io) and [ipyleaflet](https://ipyleaflet.readthedocs.io) documentation.## Installation:```bashpip install jupyterlite-sphinx```
